content.heading: Together, let’s champion the cause of education and well-being
content.description: This school, featuring 6 classrooms, offices, and dorm rooms, stands as a beacon of hope. Beyond just brick and mortar, it’s a sanctuary for orphans and less fortunate children, a place where dreams are nurtured.

content.heading: Beneficiaries
content.description: 300 students are being served, with 120 using the school as a weekly residence. Meals are also provided for those in dire need.
